com.joliciel.talismane.utils

Interface ObjectCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleObjectCache

    public interface ObjectCache
    A cache for storing objects so they don't have to be reloaded multiple times from a datastore.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearCache()
      Clear all entities out of the cache.
      void clearCache(Class<? extends Object> clazz)
      Clear all entities out of the cache corresponding to a particular Class only.
      <T> T getEntity(Class<T> clazz, Object id)
      Retrieve from the cache the entity corresponding to a given Class and id.
      <T> T getOrPutEntity(Class<T> clazz, Object id, T entity)
      If the Class and id provided already have an entity in the cache, return it, otherwise put the entity provided in the cache and return it.
      <T> void putEntity(Class<T> clazz, Object id, T entity)
      Put the entity in the cache corresponding to a given Class and id.
      <T> void removeEntity(Class<T> clazz, Object id)
      Remove the entity from the cache corresponding to a given Class and id.
